content: LOT 1: 2013 Bitcoin Specie 0.25BTC silver 1oz ANACS PF68-DCAMLOT 2: 2011 MyBitcoinMint BTC gold 0.5gLOT 3: 2014 Cryptonic BTC silver star, silver plate ICG PR68-DCAM** 1 of 30 **LOT 4: 2019 Sol Noctis Binary Bull1HG2ysoELOT 5: 2019 Sol Noctis Binary Bull15d83rGY*Both Bulls come with original box, COA, slipcoverSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0020BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 28nd, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Info on the Silver-plated brass Cryptonic:Total made:2014 Silver B: 302014 Gilt B: ¬†107 ¬†So this is a rare coin IMO, I only have one myself!  Edit - My records are from Cryptonic21's database screenshots he sent me a few months ago, quite long after most other data was lost, so I'm not sure if it said 50 somewhere else at some point.
